name: tokenised-lse
description: Tokenised LSE exchange prototype smart contracts and tooling.

scripts.test:sepolia: bash -lc 'set -a; [ -f ./.env.sepolia ] && . ./.env.sepolia; set +a; npx hardhat test test/sepolia-smoke.test.js --network sepolia'
scripts.test:sepolia:all: bash -lc 'set -a; [ -f ./.env.sepolia ] && . ./.env.sepolia; set +a; npx hardhat test --network sepolia'
scripts.dev:chain: sh -c 'npx hardhat node > logs/hardhat.log 2>&1 & sleep 1 && npm run deploy:localhost'
scripts.deploy:localhost: sh -c 'npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-ttoken.js --network localhost && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-listings.js --network localhost && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-orderbook.js --network localhost && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-dividends.js --network localhost && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-dividends-merkle.js --network localhost && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-leveraged.js --network localhost && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-award.js --network localhost && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-portfolio-aggregator.js --network localhost'
scripts.deploy:sepolia: sh -c 'set -a; [ -f ./.env.sepolia ] && . ./.env.sepolia; set +a; npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-ttoken.js --network sepolia && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-listings.js --network sepolia && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-orderbook.js --network sepolia && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-dividends.js --network sepolia && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-dividends-merkle.js --network sepolia && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-leveraged.js --network sepolia && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-award.js --network sepolia && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-portfolio-aggregator.js --network sepolia'
scripts.seed:prices:sepolia: sh -c 'set -a; [ -f ./.env.sepolia ] && . ./.env.sepolia; set +a; npx hardhat run scripts/seed-prices.js --network sepolia'
